translations: n.可怕的人（或物）；妖怪（bogeyman 的复数）

sentences.sentence: But he added: "We don't want to be chasing bogeymen."
sentences.translation: 但他补充说：“我们不想成为追逐狂人。”

sentences.sentence: News Corp is one of 28 companies rated "opaque", along with popular bogeymen such as Halliburton and walmart-and fashionable firms such as Amazon, Berkshire Hathaway, Google, Nike and Walt Disney.
sentences.translation: 新闻集团是28家被评为不透明的公司之一，这些公司还包括诸如哈利伯顿和沃尔玛这样受人欢迎的怪物公司，以及亚马逊、伯克希尔•哈撒韦公司、谷歌、耐克和迪斯尼这样的新贵公司。
